Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: sRI gurU drSn gRMQ dw ArMB:

lines.gurmukhi: drsn dyKq hI, suiD kI n suiD rhI; buiD kI n buiD rhI, miq mY n miq hY [

Unknown.translation: A glimpse of (Satguru) left me bereft of all my consciousness, senses, intelligence, cleverness and all other considered wisdom of the world.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: drSn dyKdy swr hI Bwv gurU mhwrwj jI dy srgux srUpI drSn krdy swr BI jo Jlkw Enwˆ dy inrgux srUpI pRkwS dw AMdr v`jw ArQwq AnBau hoieAw qwˆ qqkwl hI, suD nwm cyqy dI icqvn ismrx = Xwd SkqI ivsr geI[ ArQwq jo g`lwˆ muV muV cyqy Awn Awn sMskwrwˆ dy rUp ivc AMdr vuiTAw krdIAwˆ sn, ieko vwr hI bMd ho geIAwˆ[ Aru buiD buJn SkqI dI bUJ guMm ho geI[ miq buDI Akl iv`coˆ Akl QOh lw lYx dw bl, lop ho igAw[

lines.gurmukhi: suriq mY n suriq, Aau iDAwn mY n iDAwnu rihE; igAwn mY n igAwn rihE, giq mY n giq hY [

Unknown.translation: I lost my awareness, attachment of mind with insignificant matters, desires to acquire base or futile ego inflating knowledge and other worldly predicaments.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: suriq soJI dI SkqI = sUMh dI qwkq ivc sUJ n rhI Aqy iDAwn soc ivcwr ivc iDAwn socn = iKAwl krx dI ihMmq nw rhI[ igAwn ivc igAwn nw irhw Bwv jwnx dw bl AQvw jo kuC jwixAw hoieAw sI auh jwxkwrI ivcoˆ auT igAw Aqy gq rIqI, FMg, phuMc, pRivrqI g`l dI qih ivc phuMcn AQvw pRivrq hox vwlI jo SkqI sI Es dI auh giq dSw nhIˆ rhI[

lines.gurmukhi: DIrju ko DIrju, grb ko grbu gieE; riq mY n riq rhI, piq riq piq mY [

Unknown.translation: My patience was lost and so was my vanity. There was no life in me and I was bereft of my existence even.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: DIrj dw DIrj, Aqy grb hMkwr dw grb pxw AhMBwv clw igAw, qQw riq pRIqI dw pRqI Bwv rih igAw, Aru pRiqStw mwnuKI gOrvqw dI mnOq BI riq piq l`q p`q ho geI[ 'r' dw 'l' ho ky l`q p`q luV KVw geI KÍwr ho geI ArQ hoieAw[

lines.gurmukhi: AdBuq prmdBuq ibsmY ibsm; AscrjY Ascrj Aiq Aiq hY [1[9[

Unknown.translation: The glimpse of Satguru is capable of amazing one with wondrous feelings. These are astonishing and marvellous and there is no end to this amazement. (9)
